alert.note: Alert for Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:47PM CDT until May 31 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN COWLEY COUNTY... At 546 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Arkansas City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Geuda Springs and Strother Field Airport. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
